turkish_example_sentence: Siz yeşil doğal parktan ayrılmamış olsaydınız, nadir kuş türlerini gözlemleyebilirdiniz
english_example_sentence: If you had not left the green natural park, you could have observed rare bird species
russian_example_sentence: Если бы вы не покидали зеленый природный парк, вы могли бы наблюдать редкие виды птиц
